Reviews.Title: cheap breakable plastic
Reviews.Author: A. Jourdan "boardgame gooroo"
Reviews.Content: I found the original batman kit (the one I really wanted that's grey and blue) at a local discount store for a few dollars cheaper than this. I wished I would have seen it before buying this kit because two of the three things broke the first day or two my 3-yr-old played with it. The flashlight broke easily, the binoculars came apart easily, and the compass didn't work the best. Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: No Camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah K. Hartline "reagent"
Reviews.Content: Another product was sent instead of the one I ordered. After I paid for the camera warranty the camera was not in the kit.

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY AT ALL!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: manuel marquez
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item and they sent me the wrong thing.This item has a camera in it so I bought extra warrenty for it,so it cost me more money and they do not want to replace it.Now I am stuck with the adventure kit instead of the batman 3pc missin kit.that is stated in my order.And a warrenty for camera I don't have......

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Joshua J. Meduri
Reviews.Content: Cheaply made for sure, but he loved the kit for xmas. All items worked, just not likely too last much past new years.

Reviews.Title: I'm sad
Reviews.Author: Kimmely
Reviews.Content: The pricing was good, but I didn't get the product i paid for. I returned it and was told they were talking to them to get the right one and that one never came. I can't give a positive review for an item I never received. It made you feel like they didn't have it in stock

Reviews.Title: Not as described.
Reviews.Author: Merrily
Reviews.Content: The set we received didn't have the camera, instead came with some sort of compass. Unfortunately, it was supposed to be a gift for one of my 4yo twins, I ordered the matching Spiderman set for his brother. The camera was actually the big selling point, even if they would have just been to play with. Now, both sets are being returned.

ProductInfo.Features:
Binoculars 4x28 ideal for nature observations, sightseeing and sporting events
Flashlight illuminates 10 feet and is great for night excursions and needs 2AA batteries (not included)
Compass to help find where to go
ProductInfo.Name: DC comics Batman 3PC Mission Kit - Black (26383)
